description: This file defines a React functional component called DurationPieChart that renders a pie chart visualization of behavioral durations using react-chartjs-2 and Chart.js. It imports behavior labels and colors from a local library, dynamically constructs chart data based on provided behaviors, and configures chart options including legend placement and tooltips.

methods.name: DurationPieChart
methods.description: React functional component that renders a pie chart of behaviors durations based on props.
